item.title: SSR with React and Deno
item.description: SSR implementation is quite complicated. Fastro simplifies it with a simple API and minimal config. It does bundling and hydration at application initiation so that the loading process is faster. App structure # . ├── components │ └── app.tsx ├── deno.json ├── server.tsx └── static └── bundle.js Configuration # Create deno configuration file: deno.json.
